content:
The provided chunk is the initialization section of a custom widget class `EntryScaleGroup`, which inherits from `Pmw.MegaWidget`. This chunk sets up initial class variables, initializes the superclass, and prepares the interior container for housing the widget's components. It serves as the foundation upon which subsequent functionality and UI elements are built within the widget.

# Initialise superclass
        Pmw.MegaWidget.__init__(self, parent)

        # Initialize some class variables
        self.value = self['value']
        self.entryFormat = '%.2f'
        self.fScaleCommand = 0

        # Create the components.

        # Setup up container
        interior = self.interior()
        interior.configure(relief = tk.GROOVE, borderwidth = 2)
